text: Por khaŋ muuŋgiap, ana kaŋgi, mba buaadegi gumgi mbari, mbe Sadusiŋ gumgi ma. Mbe mbari, mbe Fherasiŋ ma. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap mba buaadegi gumgir kɨɨav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde nan fegi gu ŋgugi, gu Fherasi guma ma, gu Fherasin kam ma. Gu khueŋ khothɨgi, guma rimgip, zumgum taagi khavgirga. Mbe ntigem mba bigɨna nɨɨeŋra nzuav na nzuav nzuai.”
